game.name: Castle Crashers - Painter Boss Paradise
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, Remote Play 휴대전화, Remote Play 태블릿, Remote Play TV, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Painter Boss Paradise DLC provides a fresh coat of paint to Castle Crashers with new main menu art and redraws for all playable characters and weapons! Join Paint Junior, the game’s newest official character, and bring your custom characters to life with the Steam Workshop!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Painter Boss Paradise DLC provides a fresh coat of paint to Castle Crashers with new main menu art and redraws for all playable characters and weapons! Join Paint Junior, the game’s newest official character, and bring your custom characters to life with the Steam Workshop!
